abstract: Vatican court finds Pope Benedict XVI's butler Paolo Gabriele guilty of theft and sentences him to 18 months in prison; verdict caps one of most embarrassing episodes in Vatican history after tell-all book His Holiness: the Secret Papers of Pope Benedict XVI based on dozens of documents leaked by Gabriele reveals  accusations of financial misdeeds with the Vatican, as well as infighting and widespread tensions.
lead_paragraph: The court found the butler, Paolo Gabriele, guilty of theft and remanded him to house arrest.

headline.seo: Pope’s Butler Sentenced to 18 Months for Stealing Documents
